betterquesting:10.desc:8:
§bHigh-Performance Solvent§r is a solvent which is used in an §3Ore Acidizer§r to further increase the products of bedrock ores, aswell as other recipes. It can be created from §bReformate Gas§r, from a §3Vacuum Refinery§r, and §bChlorine§r in an §3Industrial Mixer§r or be obtained from an §3RBMK§r Irradiation Channel.

To transport High-Performance Solvent by hand, a §6Hazardous Material Tank§r is needed.

§2High-Performance Solvent made from an RBMK irradiation channel requires an ore acidizer.
